RelatedPhrase.word: zhen si pao zi shen shang chuan

list.key: zhen si pao zi shen shang chuan
list.abs: 真丝袍子身上穿zhen si pao zi shen shang chuan Wearing beautiful silky costumes, 裕固族姑娘人人爱yu gu zu gu niang ren ren ai The Yugur girl is loved.

means.word_mean: 1. a member of the Taoist Trinity; identified with Lao-Tse

auth_sentence.content: Mr. Shen stayed away from China for nearly a decade.

auth_sentence.content: The United States should eliminate the law, Shen said.
